document_data.mainbody:
Old Pharaohs Ruin was a variety of expensive magical spirits named after the Pharaohs of Mulhorand, available in the city of Waterdeep in the late 15 century DR.
The enchanted drink was on the menu at the Yawning Portal tavern of Waterdeep, stashed away in Durnans cabinet. One serving of Old Pharaohs Ruin was priced at ten gold coins.
